description: This file defines a React functional component 'StepReview' that renders a review step in a multi-step form wizard. It displays user-entered data, provides edit navigation, and includes a confirmation checkbox.

methods.name: StepReview({ formData, setFieldValue, touched, markTouched, errors, jumpTo, canJumpTo })
methods.description: React functional component that presents a review of form data with navigation and confirmation features.
